title: Results: Paredes of Team Medellín Takes 2024 Tour of the Gila Stage 1 Win Ahead of Stites
content:
The Colombian is thrilled with win at debut race after inching out Project Echelon's Tyler Stites in a sprint.

Read the full article at Results: Paredes of Team Medellín Takes 2024 Tour of the Gila Stage 1 Win Ahead of Stites on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
